title: How Do I Update my Credit Card Details?
body:
How Do I Update my Credit Card Details?

Follow these steps to update your Credit Card:
1. Click More tab and select Settings from the drop-down menu
2. Click Subscription Details
3. Click Billing
4. Click the Payments tab
5. Click Update Card Details
6. Enter the new card details
7. Click Confirm to apply the changes
8. The Credit Card details have been updated.
  Billing - Payments
